fixit.title: Fix it platform
fixit.text: Platform used to make orders, track the status and download 3d models of orthesis

1.title: Self-taught Beginning
1.text: I began my journey in programming as a self-taught individual, exploring HTML, CSS, and JavaScript through courses by Gustavo Guanabara and events promoted by Rocketseat.

2.title: Internship at FixIt
2.text: I joined as a frontend development intern at FixIt, where I had the opportunity to create web applications using technologies like React, Styled Components, and Axios.

3.title: Freelancer for PanOps Solutions
3.text: I started working as a freelancer for PanOps Solutions, collaborating on the development of applications using Vue.js and Quasar.

4.title: Hired by PanOps Solutions
4.text: Later, I was hired as a frontend developer by PanOps Solutions, where I continue to work, expanding my knowledge in Vue.js and exploring new technologies like Nuxt, Tailwind CSS, and various others to create even more robust and innovative solutions.

5.title: Towards New Achievements
5.text: I am ready for new challenges and growth opportunities. Committed to enhancing my skills and expanding my knowledge, I am open to exploring new technologies and methodologies. Every step forward in this journey will contribute to my continuous professional development.

text.1: I'm a technology enthusiast always seeking to push the boundaries of programming and creativity.
text.2: I love developing small scripts and customizing the interface of my Linux system to make my experience more efficient and personalized.
text.3: Moreover, I have a fascination for 3D printing, where I can turn ideas into tangible objects.
text.4: I'm constantly on the lookout for new opportunities to expand my knowledge in the world of technology.
